#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
 
inline void readInt(int &a)
{
	a = 0;
	int b = getchar_unlocked();
	while(!(b >= '0' && b <= '9'))
	{
		b = getchar_unlocked();
	}
	while(b >= '0' && b <= '9')
	{
		a = 10 * a + b - '0';
		b = getchar_unlocked();
	}
}
 
inline void printInt(int a)
{
	long long b = 0, c = 0;
	if(a == 0)
	{
		putchar_unlocked('0');
		putchar_unlocked('\n');
		return;
	}
	while(!(a % 10))
	{
		a /= 10;
		c++;
	}
	while(a)
	{
		b = 10 * b + (a % 10);
		a /= 10;
	}
	while(b)
	{
		putchar_unlocked(b % 10 + '0');
		b /= 10;
	}
	while(c)
	{
		c--;
		putchar_unlocked('0');
	}
	putchar_unlocked('\n');
}

int main()
{
    int t, a, b, arr[] = {0, 1, 4, 3, 8, 5, 2, 7, 6, 9};
    readInt(t);
    while(t--)
    {
    	readInt(a);
    	readInt(b);
    	int x = (b/10 - a/10) * 45, c = a%10, d = b%10, e = 0, f = 0;
    	a /= 10;
    	b /= 10;
    	while(a)
    	{
    		e += arr[a%10];
    		a /= 10;
    	}
    	while(b)
    	{
    		f += arr[b%10];
    		b /= 10;
    	}
    	for(int i = 0; i < c; i++)
    	{
    		x -= (arr[i]+e)%10;
    	}
    	for(int i = 0; i <= d; i++)
    	{
    		x += (arr[i]+f)%10;
    	}
    	printInt(x);
    }
    return 0;
}
